name: There,
greetingText: - I really like your name btw!
wishText: Hope this message finds you in good health and spirits.;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day .....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Wishing you the best life anyone can have but I must be the part of that best life hai or else I'll curse you Words arent enough and tbh I can't find words to explain how special you're to me .On this day,I pray to god that we never end up being strangers and always loving each other the way we do now.I want us, I want you to be a big part of my small life more yearsss to go yayyy keep loving your bestieeee Ekdam I am on top hai Iloveyousoomuchhhhhmwahhhh
